mapper.insert: insert into ShoppingMall (s_num, s_manager, s_shopurl, s_searchurl, s_shopreg, s_sname, s_email, s_age, s_phonenumber, s_image) values(#{s_num}, #{s_manager}, #{s_shopurl}, #{s_searchurl}, #{s_shopreg}, #{s_sname}, #{s_email}, #{s_age}, #{s_phonenumber}, #{s_image})
mapper.select: select * from shoppingMall order by s_num
mapper.insert: insert into adshoppingmall (s_num, ad_id, ad_pass, p_powernum) values(#{s_num}, #{s_email}, '1111', 2)
mapper.select: select * from adshoppingmall order by s_num
